name: Insomnia (itch) (Psycho Duck Arcade)
description:
2D mystery horror platformer made in under 72 hours.

Awards:

Placed Top 15 in GMC Jam 7.

Made Game of the Week on Friday13Games.com http://www.friday13games.com/play.php?game=415

Reviews:

"...Insomnia's creepy atmosphere puts many a game to shame." "If you're a fan of games on the artsier side of the spectrum, this one is for you." -Nerderp.com (http://nerderp.com/reviews.php#Insomnia)

Video Review by GameDevDan
